short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension lets you edit Pedit enabled webpages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
pedit let's you edit pedit ready webpages built for you. If you got a website built for your company/personal use and wanted to have full control over the content on the website, pedit is for you! Ask you web developer to use pedit throughout your website. Then, when the website is live, install this extension and visit your page. You'll see a pedit logo in the address bar. Click it, set up pedit and from there on out, you have full control of your webpage. **For Developers** To make your website pedit ready, visit http://github.com/pranaygp/pedit , and download the files in the JSIncludes folder. (You will also need jQuery and the Firebase JS SDK as dependencies). Then, use the "data-pedit" html attribute on text that should be editable and give each one it's own unique ID. Example:

And you're all set. It's as easy as that!
